description:
Tenma impresses her friends on a skiing trip, but her high spirits hit a downward slope when she spots a flock around Karasuma! And while everyone else is out, Harima hunkers down to work on his comic - until a friend calls for help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dream Jumbo / Dream Jump / Dream Express
Dream Jumbo. / Dream Jump. / Dream, uh, Press.
ドリームジャンボ / ドリームジャンプ / ドリームエクスプレス
